entries.rationale_summary: Price at 20-day high (155.22) with volume ratio 1.00x confirms breakout in strong uptrend (close > SMA50 > SMA200, positive slope). Healthcare sector. Risk/reward 3.97 GBP stop distance affordable in £100 portfolio when sized to available cash (0.3879 shares, £60.18 entry cost). Excellent liquidity (£351.3M avg daily volume).
